amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to state that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Army to convey the 17.1 acres of land and the 126 existing housing units known as Shenandoah Square in Mountain View, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A067) offered by Ms. Eshoo.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
